scripts.cp: cpr index.html bundled-dist/index.html && (cd bundled-dist && rimraf .gitignore README.md package.json)
scripts.deps:rs: rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo install --force wasm-pack
scripts.build-prod: echo This is a no-op. && echo Due to heavy dependencies, the generated javascript is already provided. && echo If you really want to rebuild from source use: && echo npm run build-prod-force
scripts.build-prod-force: run-s dep:rs clean build:wasm minify cp
